summary: This mod adds the playable Archon Hero Fable Race to the game. The Archons were the ancient rulers of the Old Kingdom. The first Archon was William Black, who rose to power after freeing Albion from tyrannical rule. William Black was also the first recorded Will User, which gave rise to a bloodline full of powerful Heroes.
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT NOTE: This mod is just for the Archon Race. It in no way shape or form includes Fable Plate Armors or Chainmail Helmets. I cannot direct you to a download for them on this website, but I have left a link to the Steam Workshop version of the Armors at the bottom of the description. Thanks!

------
Updates
------

1.2 - Reduced Slow Time from 30 seconds to 10 seconds.

1.1 - Fixed the Lesser Powers not using their designated magicka.
- Fixed Berserk requiring you to have your weapon out in order for the Berserk Fury effect to take place.
- Fixed Unleash Eggtor not being a Once-A-Day Power.
- Fixed Unleash Eggtor not staying for 24 minutes (or 12 hours in Skyrim time).
- Fixed Force Push not radiating out from you.
- Increased the Magicka magnitude from 50 points to 75 points for Enflame, Fireball, Force Push, & Slow Time.
- Increased the Magicka magnitude from 75 points to 150 points for Ghost Sword and Summon.

1.0 - Initial release.

------
Future Updates
------

1. Fix Eggtor so that she can attack with shouts.
2. Fix Eggtor so that she can be used as a mount.
4. Add more Fable spells.
5. ???
6. Profit!

------
Lore
------

The Archons were the ancient rulers of the Old Kingdom. The first Archon was William Black, who rose to power after freeing Albion from tyrannical rule. William Black was also the first recorded Will User, which gave rise to a bloodline full of powerful Heroes.

------
Stats
------

Heavy Armor: 10
Light Armor: 5
Two-handed: 5
One-handed: 5
Smithing: 5
Sneak: 5

Starting Health: 150
Starting Magicka: 150
Starting Stamina: 150

Male Height: 1.11
Female Height: 1.11

------
Powers & Active Effects
------

Once-A-Day Powers

Berserk: This spell sends the caster into a hulking frenzy, increasing speed and strength, while conversely decreasing reason and civilised manners. (This spell lasts 30 seconds).

Physical Shield: This spell surrounds the caster with a protective sphere of energy that will absorb almost all damage. (This spell lasts 30 seconds).

Unleash Eggtor: Eggtor is a chicken god worshipped by a small group of followers. They are required to wear a Chicken Hat and praise Eggtor during a three-day ritual. (This spell lasts 24 minutes, or 12 hours in Skyrim Time).

Lesser Powers

Enflame: This spell blasts the area surrounding the caster with a wave of fire.

Fireball: This spell creates a ball of fire in the palm of the caster\'s hand which flies toward the target when released.

Force Push: This spell creates a powerful blast of energy which radiates out from the caster, sending nearby enemies sprawling.

Ghost Sword: This spell summons an ethereal blade from the netherworld to do battle on behalf of the caster. (This power lasts 5 minutes).

Slow Time: This spell affects the very fabric of time itself; slowing everything around you to a crawl. (This power lasts 10 seconds).

Summon: This summon wrenches a creature\'s soul from the netherworld to help the caster. (This power lasts 5 minutes).

Active Effects

Archon Blood: You are the most powerful Hero in Albion because of your ancient bloodline leading back to the ancient rulers of the Old Kingdom, the Archon. You are a master of the three Hero traits, strength, skill and will.
(+ 50 HP, Stamina, and Magicka)

------
Bugs
------

None.
